Add restore procedures to backup documentation

tool_call: contentManager_appendContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732219500000_f6g7h8i9j", "workspaceId": "ws_1732219500000_k0l1m2n3o", "sessionDescription": "Adding restore procedures", "sessionMemory": "Documenting restoration process", "toolContext": "Appending content", "primaryGoal": "Complete backup docs", "subgoal": "Add restore section"}, "filePath": "/docs/backup-procedures.md", "content": "

## Restore Procedures

### Full Restore

1. Stop all services
2. Restore from backup
3. Verify data integrity
4. Restart services

### Partial Restore

Restore specific databases or files as needed"}
